entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
